subject: Golf
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Paralysis
lead_paragraph: Dennis Walters, whose competitive career was ended by an accident in 1974, received the P.G.A.’s highest annual honor, the P.G.A. Distinguished Service Award.
snippet: Dennis Walters, whose competitive career was ended by an accident in 1974, received the P.G.A.’s highest annual honor, the P.G.A. Distinguished Service Award.
